resources.string: Launch a Standard Notification with a notification\'s \"action\". This action will send a browse intent with the url of the Notification docs on developer.android.com. \n\nIt will both be displayed on the phone and on the wear device as a standard notification.

Launch a Notification with an additional action. The normal action will be to browse to an URL, but there will be an extra option to see a place on a map. \n\nThe extra action will be displayed on both the phone and on the wear device.
This is a notification with an extra action. The action will open a location on a map.
